A maliadi resembles a massive hippopotamus surrounded by a collar of flame. Maliadis are arrogant and tyrannical, and demand tribute from everyone they encounter—whether lone travelers or entire villages—to avert destruction. Many pay them off, for maliadis can hurl parts of their flaming collars to form geysers of flame or fiery walls, and they're also powerful shapeshifters. **[Recall Knowledge - Beast](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 38 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 36 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 33 [Maliadi](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1438) **Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 302 2.0 **Perception** +29; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 60 feet, [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344) **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Mwangi](/Languages.aspx?ID=39) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +36, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +28, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +28, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +29, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +29 **Str** +9 **Dex** +3 **Con** +9 **Int** +1 **Wis** +6 **Cha** +3 **Deep Breath** The maliadi can hold its breath for 1 day. --- **AC** 40 **Fort** +34 **Ref** +25 **Will** +28 **HP** 285 **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) **Collar of Fire** ([abjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=2), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) The maliadi has resistance 20 to physical ranged attacks, such as arrows, bolts, javelins, and thrown rocks, as such attacks are magically diverted through its collar of fire. Nonmagical weapons and ammunition affected by this ability are incinerated and destroyed.
**Counterspelling Wall** ([evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) **Trigger** A creature within 100 feet of the maliadi that the maliadi can see Casts a Spell that targets the maliadi; **Effect** The maliadi casts one of its innate [_wall of fire_](/Spells.aspx?ID=362) spells, with a duration of 1 round. If the spell that triggered this reaction passes through the wall of fire, the wall attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) it, with a counteract modifier of +28. --- **Speed** 30 feet, swim 20 feet; [_freedom of movement_](/Spells.aspx?ID=128) **Melee** jaws +35 ([deadly d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d12+19 piercing plus [Improved Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=27) **Melee** foot +35 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d10+17 bludgeoning **Primal Innate Spells** DC 38, attack +30 - **Cantrips (9th)** [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Produce Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=236) - **4th** [Air Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=6), [Gaseous Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=129) - **8th** [Fire Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=118), [Volcanic Eruption](/Spells.aspx?ID=360) - **9th** [Wall of Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=362) (×3), [Wall of Stone](/Spells.aspx?ID=365) (×3) - **Constant (7th)** [True Seeing](/Spells.aspx?ID=344) - **Constant (8th)** [Freedom of Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=128) **Capsize** The maliadi tries to capsize an adjacent aquatic vessel of its size or smaller. The maliadi must succeed at a DC 35 [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check (reduced by 5 for each size smaller the vessel is than the maliadi) or the pilot's [Sailing Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) DC, whichever is higher. **[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=8)** The maliadi can take on the appearance of any Large, Huge, or Gargantuan [animal](/Traits.aspx?ID=9). This doesn't change its Speed or Strikes. **River Form** The maliadi takes on the form of a stretch of river, with the effects of [_wind walk_](/Spells.aspx?ID=376), except the maliadi can only affect itself, appears as a section of a flowing river that takes up the same space as the maliadi, and can't leave the ground. **[Swallow Whole](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=35)** Huge, 3d10+17 bludgeoning, Rupture 35 **[Trample](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=39)** Huge or smaller, foot, DC 38
Monstrous Pride Due to their boundless arrogance, maliadis are unlikely to associate with others of their kind for extended periods, although they readily accept the services of smaller creatures they think might prove useful or expendable. They also dislike remaining in any form that doesn't convey their size and majesty for long. Those who know of a maliadi's hubris can often exploit it, such as by demanding a trial by combat to force the maliadi to leave an area alone.
name: Maliadi
